name: 捉妖物语/Monster Girl
description:
The game is introduced

This is a fascinating, casual, spot-the-difference puzzle game that tests your visual perceptual skills. Character accessories and the backgrounds are obscured. To complete the mission, you need to spot 4 to 8 differences to clear each level.

Update the plan


We expect the next version to be updated by the end of October, featuring richer characters and more elaborate backgrounds.
